description: Keigo Asano (浅野 啓吾, Asano Keigo) is a student at the Karakura High School, in the same class as Ichigo Kurosaki. Twelve years after Ichigo defeated Yhwach, Keigo opened up a Ramen shop. Keigo is a teenager with medium-long brown hair, which flips outward. He has brown eyes and a slim figure. His expression usually stays the same with either frowns or pouts, but whenever a girl is involved, he smiles. At school, he wears the standard Karakura High School uniform.

Professional Status.occupation: High School Student Ramen shop owner

media.alt: Keigo and Mizuiro's first meeting with Ichigo and Sado
Keigo congratulating Ichigo
Keigo, Mizuiro and Sado strike the pose
Rukia's acting saves Keigo
Keigo learns of Ichigo's "betrayal"
Ichigo finds the "Watermelon"

Keigo and Mizuiro wait for Ichigo.
Keigo, worried about Tsukishima.

Keigo is offended by Ichigo's mockery of his ramen bar.
Keigo running away using his enhanced speed.

description: Mizuho Asano (浅野 みづ穂, Asano Mizuho) is the older sister of Keigo Asano. She is the 24th Student Council President at Karakura 1st High School[2] and handles multiple school affairs, including the local Kendo Club. Mizuho has long brown hair that she ties up in a ponytail with a purple hairpiece and keeps long bangs on both sides of her face. She has slightly thick eyebrows and brown eyes. While in school, she wears the typical Karakura High School outfit.

Professional Status.occupation: High School Student Karakura 1st High School 24th Student Council President

media.alt: Ep229MizuhoProfile2

description: Tatsuki Arisawa (有沢 竜貴, Arisawa Tatsuki) is a student at Karakura High School, and is in the same class as Ichigo Kurosaki, her childhood friend and former karate partner. Tatsuki is a teenager of average height with black hair and brown eyes.[4] She has a contrasting appearance to her best friend Orihime Inoue. Tatsuki is a tomboy, and has a very lean frame compared to Orihime's curvier figure.

Professional Status.occupation: High School Student, Dojo Assistant Instructor

media.alt: A young Tatsuki Arisawa in her dōjō.
Tatsuki, looking at Ichigo as he walks away.
Tatsuki, wondering what she was touching.
Tatsuki patting Orihime affectionately.
Tatsuki after being angered by Kon as Ichigo.

name.kanji: オスカー・ホアキン・デ・ラ・ロサ

description: Oscar Joaquín De la Rosa (オスカー・ホアキン・デ・ラ・ロサ, Osukā Hoakin De ra Rosa) was Yasutora Sado's grandfather. After the death of Chad's parents, he raised him in his native Mexico until his death. De la Rosa is a muscular older man with gray hair. He wears purple cap with a yellow shirt and black suspenders. De la Rosa is a strong and sturdy old man, but with a gentle character.

media.alt: Abuelo (ep249)
Chad's coin

description: Jinta Hanakari (花刈 ジン太, Hanakari Jinta) is one of the employees of the Urahara Shop. Jinta is a small boy with red hair. He wears a white t-shirt with the Urahara Shop logo printed on the front and blue three-quarter length trousers, the bottoms of which are noticeably turned up. Seventeen months after Aizen's defeat, his hair is now slicked back and he wears a sleeveless blue shirt, edged with white and grey pants that are no longer turned up.

media.alt: Jinta and the others prepare to head out to recover Kon.
Jinta and Ururu tease Ichigo in the Shattered Shaft.
The Karakura Superheroes fight a Hollow.
Jinta rescues Ururu and attacks Yylfordt Granz.
Jinta wields a gun-like weapon.
Promotional artwork of Jinta in Bleach: Brave Souls.

description: Hashigami (橋上, Hashigami) is a young boy who goes to the same school as Yuzu Kurosaki and Karin Kurosaki. He has light and messy brown hair and freckles on his cheeks. He doesn't like Karin much because of her bad reputation. He likes to play video games with his friends Kaneda and Ino, rather than participating in gym class.

media.alt: Ep7Hashigami

description: Chizuru Honshō (本匠 千鶴, Honshō Chizuru) is a student at Karakura High School, in the same class as Ichigo Kurosaki. Her name is listed as the 31st student in academic achievements.[2] Chizuru is a thin teenager with short red hair and purple eyes, her bangs parted on both sides of her face and wears red framed glasses. She usually wears her Karakura high school uniform. She is a proud lesbian, who seems happy almost all the time.

media.alt: Ep214ChizuruProfile
Chizuru attacking Orihime, under the influence of Numb Chandelier's special abilities.
Chizuru grabs Orihime from behind in a possessive manner.
Chizuru and Mizuiro wait in an alley.

name: Harutoki Ide
description: Harutoki Ide is a resident of Karakura Town and friend of Yasutora Sado. One night, Harutoki comes across a cockatiel, which he then becomes the owner of. Eventually, he discovers that it is cursed and has brought horrible deaths to all of its previous owners. After hearing that, Harutoki attempts to pass off the cockatiel to his friends, Gitano and Sado. Gitano immediately refuses, having heard of the cockatiel's grim history, and then warns Sado about it as well.

media.alt: Ep4HarutokiIde

description: Ino (伊野, Ino) is a young boy who goes to the same school as Yuzu Kurosaki and Karin Kurosaki. He has untidy brown hair which sticks up in random places. He wears thick black glasses and his P.E. kit. He dislikes Karin because of her nasty reputation. He likes to play video games with his friends Hashigami and Kaneda rather than going to gym class. While Ino, Hashigami, and Kaneda are playing video games, Ino complains about gym class. They continue playing their video game until Ino loses.

media.alt: Ep7Ino

description: Orihime Inoue (井上 織姫, Inoue Orihime) is a Human living in Karakura Town. She is a former student of Karakura High School. She is married to Ichigo Kurosaki and has a son named Kazui Kurosaki. Orihime is a teenager of average height. She has brown eyes[4] and long, waist-length, burnt orange hair. Her most noticeable physical trait is her slender yet curvaceous figure for a teenager, especially in terms of her large breasts.

quotes.quote: I was proud of my hair color that my brother admired. I was happy to be told such things, so I grew my hair out ever since I was little. Soon after I entered middle school, 3rd years said they didn't like my hair color and cut it. I had no choice but to cut the rest short to even it out. I couldn't tell brother.'I felt like changing it', is what I said to dodge the question. Then my brother died soon after. I became alone. I stopped talking, even at school, and became more alone than ever before. The one who stopped me from being that way was Tatsuki-chan. Tatsuki-chan yelled at me for backing down and she looked out for me. I could grow my hair out again thanks to her. I will never have short hair again, because my long hair is proof of my faith in Tatsuki-chan.
'I will not forgive those who hurt Tatsuki!

Thank you, Tatsuki. Please do not worry, Tatsuki. Because Tatsuki will come find me, that's why I can go anywhere without worry. If the place I'm going is somewhere Tatsuki can't go, then please wait for me here, I will come back for sure. Come back to Tatsuki's side.

It's not frustrating at all. It's just... it's going to be lonely, not being able to fight alongside everyone. But being lonely isn't nearly as bad as being in the way. If I'm just going to be a hindrance to Kurosaki-kun, to everyone, then it's far better to be lonely

Kurosaki-kun, you know I had a lot of things I wanted to do... I want to be a teacher... I also want to be an astronaut... and also make my own cake shop... I want to go to the sweets bakery and say 'I want one of everything'... Ohhhh, I wish I could live life five times over. Then I’d be born in five different places, and I’d stuff myself with different food from around the world... I’d live five different lives with five different occupations... and then, for those five times... I’d fall in love with the same person...

I don't believe that he showed me the Hōgyoku because he trusts me... but, at least I have learned the location of the Hōgyoku... and... about my own power, too. Everything that has occurred... it reverses it all, and destroys the very event itself. Thank you, Kurosaki-kun, for coming to save me, but I've found something I must do here. And it's definitely...something only I can do. With my power... I will return the Hōgyoku to before it ever existed!

Kurosaki-kun... doesn't assure us he is going to win for that reason. Kurosaki-kun is a kind person. Whenever he uses strong words, it's like he's making a promise. I believe that, he makes a promise to himself. I think that he expresses his feelings in words so that he will follow through. So that's why it's okay. When Kurosaki-kun says he is going to win, he'll win for sure. So...so that's why we should wait and believe in him.
Don't die! Kurosaki-kun! I don't mind if you don't win. You don't even have to try. So please, don't get yourself hurt any more...

Maybe it's impossible to feel exactly the same way as another person, but it's possible for people to care about one another and to place their hearts as close together as they can manage. I'm sure that's what it means to make your hearts as one.

It's like, even though we're human, we can just spend time here in Hueco Mundo like it's normal now. Helping out all the Arrancar people, doing our best to help the Shinigami protect their home...it's just kind of nice, don't you think? I kind of wish things could stay like this forever. All of us together, helping each other out, trying to do what's best for everyone's worlds...and one day we look back and realize the start of the war just never came...

name: Kagine
description: Kagine-sensei (鍵根) is a high school physical education teacher at Karakura High School. He's a tall, muscular man with short black hair and a mustache. Kagine is a very strict man, who is easily angered. However, he is also easily moved to tears as demonstrated with Rukia when she pretends to cry to deflect his anger from Ichigo and his friends.

media.alt: Ep67KagineProfile
Kagine scolding the pupils.

description: Kaneda (金田, Kaneda) is a young boy who goes to the same school as Yuzu Kurosaki and Karin Kurosaki. He is obese and he has black hair. His eyebrows look like flags, and he also has a dounut shaped mouth. He dislikes Karin much because of her nasty reputation. He likes to play video games with his friends Hashigami and Ino rather than going in to gym class.

media.alt: Ep7Kaneda

name.kanji: ドン・観音寺, Don Kanonji), real name Misaomaru Kanonji (観音寺 ミサオ丸, Kanonji Misaomaru), is a popular spirit Mediumship who hosts a television show called Casual Soul Realm Assault Trip (ぶらり霊場突撃の旅, Burari Reijō Totsugeki no Tabi), often referred to simply as Cazh Soul (ぶら霊

description: Don Kanonji (ドン・観音寺, Don Kanonji), real name Misaomaru Kanonji (観音寺 ミサオ丸, Kanonji Misaomaru), is a popular spirit Mediumship who hosts a television show called Casual Soul Realm Assault Trip (ぶらり霊場突撃の旅, Burari Reijō Totsugeki no Tabi), often referred to simply as Cazh Soul (ぶら霊, Bura Tama).[2][3] Tall and thin, Kanonji has deep-set eyes and a mustache, but is not handsome at all.[2] He wears glasses and a variety of flashy outfits and hats. He sometimes wears a cape as well.

media.alt: Ep50DonKanonjiProfile
Kanonji arrives for filming and makes his trademark pose.
Don Kanonji uses his Kanonji-Style Final Super Attack: Kanonball.
Don Kanonji and Ichigo with the defeated Hollow.
Kanonji as part of the Karakura-Raizer Team.
Kanonji appears.
Kanonji is stunned by Matsumoto's arrival.
Kanonji-Style Final Super Attack: Kanonball.
Promotional artwork of Don Kanonji fighting alongside Pícaro in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Don Kanonji by himself.

quotes.quote: Every week, when it is time, they stick to the TV. They watch my actions in the comfort of their families after dinner. Children watch my actions and their hearts leap. They see me stand up to evil spirits and... they know what courage is...! Do you understand, boy? With them watching, I can't run away from the enemy...!

I have abilities... I can understand the difference between myself and the enemy. However, boy... your ideas made an impression on me! The way of fighting where one thinks people's safety first indiscriminately... your way of fighting is befitting of a hero! Allow me to call you battle buddy.
So sorry to keep you waiting, faithful viewers. Your Don Kanonji... My Don Kanonji... Everyone's Don Kanonji has returned!! I!! HAVE!! RETURNED!!!
...Run? Is that how you speak to a hero? How little you understand. Allow me to educate you. If a hero were to run from battle... the children could no longer call him a hero.

description: Mizuiro Kojima (小島 水色, Kojima Mizuiro) is a student in Karakura High School and is in the same class as Ichigo Kurosaki. Mizuiro has short black hair and green eyes, parted down the middle with a stray bang in his face and the tips fanning out. He looks very young and wears the Karakura high school uniform with the jacket zipped up. 17 months later, his hair is now straight and has grown out to cover his ears.

media.alt: Mizuiro riding on the back of Keigo's bike.
Mizuiro with Ichigo.
Mizuiro being described by Ichigo to Rukia.
Mizuiro greeting Rukia.
Ichigo's friends greet him with Bohahahaha.
Mizuiro at the principal's office.
Mizuiro being upset over Ichigo and Sado's good grades.
Mizuiro reveals his holiday plans.
Mizuiro handing concert tickets to Keigo.
Mizuiro unnerving Keigo with his politeness.
Mizuiro, Keigo and Tatsuki watch as Ichigo leaves for Hueco Mundo.
Mizuiro attempts to take out Aizen with flammable gas.
Mizuiro and Keigo talk while waiting for Ichigo.
Mizuiro talks with his friends about Ichigo's departure.
Mizuiro receiving a Soul Ticket from Shunsui.
Mizuiro chastises Keigo for holding inside conversations.

description: This article is about the high school student Ryō. For the Bount, see Ryō Utagawa. Ryō Kunieda (国枝 鈴, Kunieda Ryō) is a classmate of Ichigo Kurosaki at Karakura High School. Ryō has long black hair and a mole under her left eye. She wears the standard Karakura school uniform. Ryō loves to read and is very bright, usually being found with a book. She ranks second in her grade on the school exams at Karakura High School and is never in trouble.

media.alt: Ep6RyoProfile
Ryō listens to Orihime's strange story.
Ryō encounters Kon.

description: Ichigo Kurosaki (黒崎 一護, Kurosaki Ichigo) is a Human who is also a Substitute Shinigami. Ichigo is the son of Isshin and Masaki Kurosaki, and older brother of Karin and Yuzu. He is also married to Orihime Inoue and has a son named Kazui Kurosaki. Ichigo's most distinguishing feature is his spiky orange hair, a trait he has been ridiculed about for years on end. He is a fairly tall, lean-built young man with peach skin and brown eyes. He likes to wear slim fitting clothes.

Professional Status.occupation: High School Student Substitute Shinigami Errand Boy of the Unagiya Shop Translator

description: Karin Kurosaki (黒崎 夏梨, Kurosaki Karin) is the fraternal younger twin sister of Yuzu, daughter of Isshin and Masaki Kurosaki, and youngest sister of Ichigo. Karin has dark grey eyes and black hair that is straight and cropped to hang around her face, just above her shoulders. Her eyes are large and dark. When not wearing her school uniform, Karin typically wears sportswear consisting of knee-length leggings or shorts with alternative shirts, trainers.

Personal Status.education: Karakura S. Primary School[4]Mashiba Middle School

quotes.quote: Whether you can see them or not, as long as you don't believe, it's the same as them not existing.

description: Kazui Kurosaki (黒崎一勇, Kurosaki Kazui) is a human with Shinigami powers. He is the son of Ichigo Kurosaki and Orihime Inoue.[2] Kazui is a small boy with orange hair and large dark orange eyes. His face closely resembles that of his mother's, having the same shaped eyes and facial curves, while he inherited his father's spiky hair, though his hair is noticeably smoother than Ichigo's. He wears a light blue hoodie and white pants.

media.alt: 686Kazui profile
Kazui meets Ichika Abarai.
Kazui takes a Soul to Takakomo Shrine so he can pass on.
Kazui manifests a large fish to ride on.
Kazui opens a portal lined with teeth.

description: Yuzu Kurosaki (黒崎 遊子, Kurosaki Yuzu) is the fraternal older twin of Karin and the younger sister of Ichigo Kurosaki. Yuzu's appearance is a stark contrast to her sister's. Yuzu has short light blonde hair,[5] with short bangs hanging over the right side of her forehead. She also wears a red hair clip on the left side of her head. Her eyes are dark brown and appear much softer than Karin's. Yuzu dresses more girlishly when compared to her sister.

media.alt: Yuzu as a baby with the rest of her family.
Yuzu yells at Ichigo and Isshin to behave and sit down to dinner.
Yuzu injured after the Hollow attacks.
Yuzu looks for her pajamas in Ichigo's room.
Yuzu and Isshin examine Sado's injury.
Yuzu informs Ichigo that Karin is sick.
Yuzu almost catches Rukia as Ichigo hides her in the closet.
The Kurosaki's walk to Masaki's grave.
Yuzu strangled by the Grand Fisher.
Yuzu and her father get excited at Don Kanonji's show.
Yuzu enjoys the fireworks with her family and friends.
Yuzu with the cat Raku.
Yuzu and Isshin eavesdrop on Ichigo and Rukia.
Yuzu and Karin asleep in Ichigo's room.
Yuzu welcomes Nozomi to the household.
Ichigo congratulates Yuzu on her exam result.
Karin and Yuzu try to stop Ichigo from attacking Tsukishima.
Yuzu in The Hell Verse.

description: These are various students attending Karakura High School. Shunya Asō (麻生 瞬哉, Asō Shunya) is a student at Karakura High School and a classmate of Ichigo Kurosaki.[1] Shunya is a lean young man with light-colored hair and a narrow face.

description: Misato Ochi (越智美諭, Ochi Misato) is a teacher at Karakura High School. Her pupils include Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends. Misato Ochi is a young woman with rounded glasses and long brown hair tied back in a pony tail.[1] She later cuts her hair to shoulder length.[2] She is generally an easy going person who isn't bothered by Ichigo's absence. Nor of those of others such as Uryū and Chad, simply saying that they will eventually return to school.

media.alt: Ep64MisatoProfile
Misato and her students wake up in the mountains.
Misato berates Ichigo for being away for so long.

description: Michiru Ogawa (小川みちる, Ogawa Michiru) is a classmate of Ichigo Kurosaki and Orihime Inoue at Karakura High School. Michiru has short brown hair, with her bangs pulled back in a clip. She wears the standard Karakura High School uniform. Michiru is very shy and is afraid of Ichigo and Uryū Ishida because they never smile but claims to not hate them. She is in the same crafts club as Uryū.[2] She is also considered to be a meeha, or a follower of new fads.

media.alt: Ep7MichiruProfile
Michiru asks Tatsuki about her art project.
Michiru thanks Uryū for fixing her torn doll.
Michiru explains that she finds Ichigo's face scary.
Tatsuki carries Michiru.

description: Reiichi Ōshima (大島麗一, Ōshima Reiichi) is a student at Karakura High School. Reiichi is a tall teenager with bleached hair and bleached eyebrows. He has three earrings in his left ear and a ring on his lower left lip. Reiichi was part of a sizeable group fighting with Ichigo and Chad during their first day at Karakura High School.[3] Reiichi confronts Ichigo Kurosaki on the roof of the school during lunch.

media.alt: Ep227OshimaProfile

name: Gitano Shigeo
description: Gitano Shigeo is a teenager who is offered the parakeet that Yūichi Shibata's soul resides in. Gitano wears a regular T-shirt with a short-sleeved button up and a Hawaiian-style print shirt over it. He has shoulder length, blond hair and a goatee. He frequently carries his guitar case on his back. Due to his part time job barely covering his living costs, Gitano seeks out cheap food whenever possible, even ignoring expiration dates on food.

media.alt: Ep12GitanoProfile

description: Keisuke Sorimachi (反町 圭助, Sorimachi Keisuke)[1] is a student of Karakura High School. He is Reiichi Ōshima's friend and right hand man. Sorimachi has shoulder length brown hair which is kept back with the help of a hair fastener. His face is constantly pursed and his eyebrows lowered to keep up his tough guy act. Sorimachi accompanies Reiichi as he and their gang attack Ichigo Kurosaki and Yasutora Sado.[2] Sorimachi is backing Reiichi up when he confronts Ichigo during lunchtime.

media.alt: Ep227SorimachiProfile

description: Mai Suzuki (鈴木 舞, Suzuki Mai) is a high school student and former classmate of Kyōko Haida. Mai has brown hair with red clips on the left of her bangs, and has dark-colored eyes. She wears a school uniform from her high school, which consists of a short-sleeved white shirt, a light blue colored vest, and a dark blue skirt.[1] Mai is a friendly and carefree teenage girl. She was also once the only friend of Kyōko Haida.

media.alt: Icon-Warning-Yellow
Ep261MaiProfile

name.kanji: ジャッキー トリスタン

description: Jackie Tristan (ジャッキー トリスタン, Jakkī Torisutan) is a Human who formerly possessed Fullbring powers and is a former member of the organization known as Xcution. Jackie is a tall dark-skinned woman with straight chin-length dark hair, brown eyes and full lips. She wears a dark brown long-sleeved low cut shirt with form-fitted trousers and dark knee lengths boots.

media.alt: Ep347JackieProfile
Young Jackie.
Young Jackie finds her family dead.
Jackie disagrees with Kūgo's methods regarding Ichigo.
Jackie asks Kūgo if he thinks Ichigo will be alright.
Jackie fights Ichigo in Riruka's Fish Tank.
Jackie destroys Ichigo's attack.
Ichigo takes Jackie by surprise.
Jackie held down as Ichigo's powers go berserk.
Jackie, Giriko, Yukio, and Riruka after receiving Ichigo's power from Kūgo.
Jackie is injured by Renji.
Jackie's Fullbring, Dirty Boots.
Jackie activating her Fullbring after receiving Ichigo's powers.
Promotional artwork of Jackie in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: It's true, I always did hate my ability. But strangely enough, now I've lost it I find myself envying Giriko, who managed to hold on to his until the moment he died. At some point I must have realized that these Fullbrings we bear are all that really holds us together. That must be why I'm feeling this way.

description: Ururu Tsumugiya (紬屋 雨, Tsumugiya Ururu) is an employee of the Urahara Shop. Ururu is a young-looking girl with a perpetual blush on her cheeks who wears a white t-shirt with the Urahara Shop logo in pink print and a knee-length, pink skirt with white dots. She has round purple eyes and long, black hair with a purple tint. It is parted down the middle, with two strands of her bangs in the middle of her face, opposing each other. The rest of her hair is in pigtails with pink ties.

media.alt: Kisuke reassures Ururu when she cries while apologizing to him.
Ururu and the others prepare to head out to recover Kon
Ururu being told of her mistake
Ururu witnesses Urahara and Yoruichi's reunion
Ururu attacks Ichigo
Ururu gets ready to deliver a powerful kick
Urahara stops Ururu from initiating her "rescue" operation.
Ururu prepares to launch mat to catch Ichigo and his friends.
Ururu surprises Yylfordt.
Tessai healing Ururu's injuries.
Ururu with her weapon, Senren Bakusatsu Taihō.
Ururu kicks Yylfordt.

description: Kyōko Haida (灰田 響子, Haida Kyōko) is a new student who transfers into Karakura High School during the events of the Tōjū Campaign. Kyōko has dark brown eyes and short black hair with bangs that curve inward. She initially wears her school uniform from the high school she transferred from, which consists of a short-sleeved white shirt, a light blue colored vest, and a dark blue skirt. She later receives a Karakura High School uniform. Initially, Kyōko is quiet and somewhat solitary.

media.alt: Icon-Warning-Yellow
Ep261KyokoProfile
Kyōko and Mai Suzuki as friends.
Kyōko confronting Orihime Inoue about her unique powers.
Kyōko conversing with the Zanpakutō's spirit.
Kyōko, possessed by the spirit, tries to kill Mai.
Orihime using her Sōten Kisshun to separate Kyōko from the Tōjū.

The Tōjū possessing Kyōko Haida.

description: Haruko (ハルコ, Haruko) is a citizen of Karakura Town. She is a Human who possesses spiritual power. Haruko is a bespectacled buxom young woman with red-violet hair and dark purple eyes. She wears a golden yellow hair clip on the back of her head, and her hair extends past her shoulders and down the upper part of her back. She wears a dark blue dress with a white shirt underneath, an off-white jacket-like blouse over her dress, dark blue leggings, and brown high-heeled shoes.

media.alt: Icon-Warning-Yellow
Ep314HarukoProfile
Haruko asks Ichigo for directions.
Kon sees Haruko on the bridge.
The Tapeworm Hollow attacks Haruko.
Kon saves Haruko from the Tapeworm Hollow.
Kon tells Haruko to live.
The Tapeworm Hollow possesses Haruko.
Kon returns Haruko to normal.
Haruko embraces Ichigo, not realizing who he is.

description: This article is about the high school student Shinji. For the Visored, see Shinji Hirako. Shinji Iijima (飯島真治, Iijima Shinji) is a freshman in Karakura High School and a member of the Karakura High School Kendō Club. Shinji is a small teenage boy with brown hair. He has large brown eyes and wears the school kendo uniform.[1] Shinji is initially a coward, however, thanks to Ikkaku Madarame, he is able to gain enough courage to avenge the defeat of his seniors.

media.alt: Icon-Warning-Yellow
Ep133ShinjiProfile
Shinji delivers the winning hit onto his opponent.

description: Miyuki (みゆき, Miyuki) is a Human girl that was saved by Kon after almost drowning. Miyuki's appearance is that of a young girl with short, brown shoulder-length hair, gray eyes, and a perpetual blush on her cheeks.[1] Miyuki, whose parents split up, doesn't have any friends and spends most of the day alone with her only companion, a stuffed doll.

media.alt: Icon-Warning-Yellow
Ep135MiyukiProfile
Miyuki and her family as well as the original Shintarō
Miyuki and Shintarō the doll

description: Riruka Dokugamine (毒ヶ峰 リルカ, Dokugamine Riruka) is a Fullbringer and formerly member No. 003[1] of the organization known as Xcution. Riruka is a young, slender girl with magenta eyes and long hair of matching color, tied into two pigtails, and between which she wears a light-colored hat that has two extensions in the back, made to look like rabbit's ears.[3] A strand of hair hangs down the right side of her face and she has a fringe over her forehead.

quotes.quote: I like all kinds of things already, and I'm sure I'll find plenty more things I like in the future! I want to spend my whole life collecting all kinds of different things I like until I'm crushed to death by the weight of them!
I will never become dirty. I will always be clean and cute. Even when I die.
quotes.to: herself while thinking about Jackie Tristan's Fullbring

quotes.quote: If you ask anyone to name a universal rule that governs animals and humans alike, I bet you most people would answer
Anything I wanted could be mine. I just had to hide it away.

'Survival of the fittest' is just a pretty lie that they tell you. A lie to make weak people believe that if they try their best, they can come out on top. Truth is, it isn't the weak that get eaten. It's not about strength, it's about numbers. The ones who stand at the top of the food chain are the brainless dolts. The loudmouths. Because there are so, so many of them. You know it's true. Everybody does. You all just turn a blind eye and pretend not to notice.

description: Kūgo Ginjō (銀城 空吾, Ginjō Kūgo) is a Fullbringer and was the leader and member No. 001 of the organization known as Xcution.[1] He is also a former Substitute Shinigami. Ginjō is a tall and lean-built man with fair skin, brown eyes,[3] and shoulder-length black hair that he keeps combed back, down to the nape of his neck. After being released from Tsukishima's Fullbring, Ginjō lets his hair become messy with strands hanging over his face.

media.alt: Ep344GinjoProfile

Ginjō returns his sword to its original state.

Ginjō wielding the Bankai he gained from Ichigo's power.

quotes.quote: All throughout history, be it royals or samurai or whatever, this world has always been ruled by minorities! You're not the ones in the wrong. It's this world that's become too lenient towards idiots. It's time we changed all that. This time, we're gonna be the ones at the top of the food chain.
Time will try to constantly try to catch up with you. And with a roar, it will overcome you. Do not look ahead. Hope only lies within the unforeseeable current that will close in from behind.
quotes.reference: Bleach anime; Episode 365, next episode preview

quotes.quote: I fully intend to crush the Shinigami for betraying me as they did. I thought you would try to convince me that was wrong. And yet, you don't even bother? Why? Those eyes... They're the eyes of a man who's trying to understand me. Of a man putting himself in my shoes, treating me as an equal. Are you trying to say you already understand why I'm doing this, and choose to deny me regardless?

Ichigo... If our positions had been reversed... Would things have still turned out the same way? Would you have ended up like me? Tell me, Ichigo... If our positions were reversed... Could we have been...

Back From Black Welcome To Our Xcution Fullbring Training Fullbring Training, Round 2 Fullbring Training, Round 3 Ichigo Kurosaki & Kūgo Ginjō vs. Shūkurō Tsukishima Ichigo Kurosaki & Kūgo Ginjō vs. Shūkurō Tsukishima & Xcution Death & Strawberry: Deathberry Returns Ichigo Kurosaki & Uryū Ishida vs. Kūgo Ginjō The Royal Guard Arrive

description: Giriko Kutsuzawa in "The Six Fullbringers"Truly, it is in impeccable timing that the divine can be found. Giriko Kutsuzawa (沓沢 ギリコ, Kutsuzawa Giriko) is a Fullbringer and a member of Xcution. Giriko is a tall, middle-aged man who possesses short dark hair, brown eyes and a thick mustache. He wears a shirt and dark waistcoat with a bow tie, reminiscent of a typical bartender's outfit.

Personal Status.relatives: Unnamed Great Grandfather (deceased)[1] Unnamed Grandfather (deceased)[1] Unnamed Father (deceased)[1] Unnamed Wife (deceased)

quotes.quote: Truly, it is in impeccable timing that the divine can be found.

name.kanji: 茶渡 泰虎, Sado Yasutora), also known as Chad (チャド

description: Yasutora Sado (茶渡 泰虎, Sado Yasutora), also known as Chad (チャド, Chado), is a Human living in Karakura Town. He is a professional boxer who participates in televised matches. He was a classmate of Ichigo Kurosaki's during their time at Karakura High School. Sado is a teenager of Mexican and Japanese descent. He is dark-skinned with pronounced cheek-bones and has wavy brown hair with bangs that generally hangs over his brown eyes.

Primary Skill.fullbring: Brazo Derecha de Gigante Brazo Izquierda del Diablo

Voices.spanish: Rafael Oriol (Spain) Dan Osorio (Episodes 2-366), Carlos Reynoso (Episode 367-) (Latin)

Sado in the 2018 live action film.

Sado's injuries in the manga.

quotes.quote: The more complex a person, the weaker they are.
Ichigo wants to save her. Ichigo went all out for her, and that's enough. That's all the reason I need to put my life on the line for anything.
That's right. Very important. Maybe even more important than my life.
quotes.to: About the coin his Abuelo gave him

quotes.quote: Sorry. The truth is, I don't like doing things like dealing the deathblow to opponents who have lost the will to fight. But this time, it seems I can't even say such naive things.
This power of mine seems to be less like a Shinigami or a Quincy and more like you Hollows.
Because you fought me with all your might, I was able to grasp my power. Thanks. Because of you, I'll be able to tough it out ahead. I'll spare your life and pray for your good fortune.

description: Moe Shishigawara (獅子河原 萌笑, Shishigawara Moe) is a high school student from Miyashita Commercial High School. He is also a Fullbringer who once worked under Shūkurō Tsukishima. Moe is short teenager who sports a shaved head with a buzzed mohawk in the middle, and grey eyes. His right hand is wrapped in bandages in order to conceal his knuckle. He wears his high school uniform with his jacket open. Under his jacket he wears a red shirt with a face on it. He has a gangster like appearance.

media.alt: Ep349ShishigawaraProfile3
Moe stalks Orihime.
Moe attacks Orihime.
Orihime comes between Moe and Tsukishima when he produces his Fullbring.
Moe and Tsukishima discuss their next step.
Moe steps in to fight Kūgo.
Moe breaks Ikkaku's Zanpakutō.
Moe carries a dying Tsukishima.
Moe and Ikkaku engage in hand-to-hand combat.
Moe's Fullbring, Jackpot Knuckle.
Promotional artwork of Shishigawara in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Shishigawara wielding his Fullbring, Jackpot Knuckle.

quotes.quote: As your underling, I can't just turn my back on this situation! I appreciate your concern, Tsukishima-san, but I value your honor over my own life!
I'm gonna show you how man I am by pounding your face into the ground!!
I decided a long time ago to use my life for Tsukishima-san's sake!!
Tsukishima-san is crazy strong! I'd die for him without a second thought!!

You're the greatest, and that's all there is to it! So don't you do dyin' on me, Tsukishima-san! You're the most awesome guy there is! So you can't go dyin', got that?! You're s'posed to be invincible!
What're you thanking me for?! Saving you ain't nothin' I oughta be thanked for! I'm just doin' my duty! I wouldn't be much of an underling otherwise, would I?

description: Shūkurō Tsukishima (月島 秀九郎, Tsukishima Shūkurō) is a Fullbringer and a former member of Xcution. Tsukishima is an extremely tall young man with brown eyes and wavy black hair that is at shoulder length. He wears a long-sleeved collared shirt with suspenders and dark pants.[2] He has a long scar running vertically along the side of his left eye, which comes from a wound that he got as a child.[3] Tsukishima is cold and collected in most things he does, normally appearing calm and even carefree.

media.alt: Ep353TsukishimaProfile
Tsukishima first meets Ginjō.
Orihime Inoue is confronted by Tsukishima.

Tsukishima wielding Book of the End.
An alternate version of Tsukishima's Human form.

Differences in the anime's rendition of events and the manga's rendition of events.

quotes.quote: Why did you have to die? Why would you do that?! Why?!! Why would you do that, Ginjō?!! Ginjō, you taught me how to use my power. You taught me how to fight. So why, Ginjō. Why?! Why did you never teach me what I should do when you were gone?!

name.kanji: 雪绪･ハンス･フォラルルベルナ, Yukio Hansu Foraruruberuna) is a Fullbringer and formerly member No. 005[1] of the organization known as Xcution. He is also the president of his family's company, Y. Hans Enterprise (ワイハンス・エンタープライズ

description: Yukio Hans Vorarlberna (雪绪･ハンス･フォラルルベルナ, Yukio Hansu Foraruruberuna) is a Fullbringer and formerly member No. 005[1] of the organization known as Xcution. He is also the president of his family's company, Y. Hans Enterprise (ワイハンス・エンタープライズ, Waihansu Entāpuraizu).[3] Yukio is a young boy with green eyes and spiky, blonde hair with bangs that are usually covering his left eye.

quotes.quote: I've never formed a real connection with anyone, Fullbring or no Fullbring.

name.kanji: 道羽根 アウラ, Michibane Aura) is a Fullbringer who formed and led the "XCUTION Religious Organization"
name.romaji: a cult in the Human World that knows about the existence of Soul Society. She is also the host of the Saketsu (鎖結; Japanese for "Binding Chain"

description: Aura Michibane (道羽根 アウラ, Michibane Aura) is a Fullbringer who formed and led the "XCUTION Religious Organization", a cult in the Human World that knows about the existence of Soul Society. She is also the host of the Saketsu (鎖結; Japanese for "Binding Chain") of the Soul King. After her death as a Human, she resides as a Soul in Hueco Mundo alongside the Arrancar there. Aura is an incredibly beautiful young woman, with short black hair which is longer on her left side.

First Appearance.novel: Bleach: Can't Fear Your Own World
